post.body: It actually didn't hurt much ... I more so panicked because of the idea of it and the vision of it...
- How funny is it that the new designers I blogged about has your name and your daughter's name?
I sliced my finger good this afternoon. IDK when I became such a panzy. I got so weak in the knees @ the sight of all the blood
Go on wit your bad self...
LOL! You're impossible!
Seriously you sound like my cousin! ROTFLMAO! O, all the hard work will pay off & u'll be happy u had'em when you're like 55
Nice! I love clever things like that ... totally something I would do ... if I had kids...
LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the blog. Now that's fashion-inspired...
Rachel Roy Pre-Fall is seriously scrumptious! Have you seen Valentino? There's a blk sequins dress I need-by n-e-means necess.
Before Mercedes Benz began sponsoring fashion week again, who sponsored?
Can't imagine not doing high heels. What styles do you wear then? Designers?
Is it me or DKNY never showed at the tents? At least not in the last few seasons???
Awe, I'm sorry.
the Chanel mobile art wz awesome! I hope they make it to TO
Yeah, I wish I could keep them! If they sent both pairs and they were in my size, there would be trouble, lol.
Wooohooo!
That and a lot more, I'm afraid...
@shoemitten good morning
yep, catching up.
2 go along w/ that - Some things NOT 2 get'em http://tinyurl.com/59uubq
Check out this guide on what 2 get the dude in ur life Ladies, lol, he'll prob likeit http://tinyurl.com/57k5zo
Just found that The Hill Tweets! Excited to follow ...
Do they have a boutique next to bryant park?
To think that I was Pre-Med in college, I've gotten to be such a wuss...can't imagine it now...
Alex and Chloe - Necklaces for the Cool Chics...Wunderbloc | New York http://tinyurl.com/64tb2r via @ShareThis
It stopped bleeding. I wz terrified that I wld need stitches. Never had to get stitches B4
Was The Perfect Holiday on 2007's worst movie list? If not, it should be...
Gosh, Morris Chestnutt is beeeautiful! Watching The Perfect Christmas...elated that I'm off tomorrow, he-he.
I know! And only one! They have no use for just 1 and not a full pair. ... they tried to sabotage him...
They stole one of his wrestling sneakers...he wrestled in Vance's! But still won...those Livingston kids think they're tough...
Yes! Thanks!
I love Love Actually the movie ... "become a rockstar and they'll give them to you for free!" ... enjoying a movie and drinking mudslide...
It's not Christmas yet so why do u know!
There are like 40 kids in my fam. Got to create a cutoff
Going to finish up my christmas shopping. Only children under 5 on my list this year
The Best Dressed Heels Wunderbloc | New York http://tinyurl.com/5e4zg6 via @ShareThis
Woohooo, curt n I are going to sit at this diner hv brunch and hang. Y'all shld come!
Requesting shoe samples from spring collections...
The 10 Best Heeled Women of 2008 http://tinyurl.com/3ezwee via @ShareThis
Now watching Threes Company on Tvland. Like seeing ol friends again.
